Detailed Description

Gabor filters class.

Based on apply_filters.c written by David Bolme - Colorado State University

This code is used to extract regularly spaced gabor jets from a normalized face image.

Usage: apply_filters nrm_image gabor_image

The program creates a file (gabor_image) of SUN floating point values that corispond to 675 gabor jets of length 32 each.

Modified by por Modesto Castrillón Santana to make use of IplImages 10/11/04, and generate a float image with 32 channels
